compatibility.notes: The proprietary nature of the IEC-Code-Components-EULA license imposes strict limitations on compatibility with open-source licenses, particularly those that require derivative works to be open-source.

key_requirements: Include the disclaimer of warranties and liabilities.
Provide attribution for Code Components derived from IEC standards.
license.name: IEC-Code-Components-EULA
obligations: Retain the Copyright Notice and list of conditions in redistributions.
Attribute each Code Component to IEC and identify the IEC standard from which it is taken.
Obtain prior written permission to use the name of IEC or specific contributors for endorsement.
